title.bibl: La Defensa, Vol. II, No. 3, January 18, 1936. "A Repatriation Program"

div.bibl: La Defensa, Vol. II, No. 3, January 18, 1936. "A Repatriation Program"

body.p: The Mexican Government is discussing a very interesting plan to solve the problem of repatriation. Many Mexicans will return to Mexico when this materializes. The Mexican Government has appropriated about two million pesos for that purpose.
Since the depression the Cook County Social Agencies have paid the expenses of many Mexican families to the Mexican Border. The Mexican authorities will transport them to their destination.
